item.description:
Come and meet members of the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club at our 2nd annual pub crawl. Last year we had almost 50 people - all had a good time and several ended up skiing and riding with us all last winter. The pub crawl is a perfect way to make friends before the ski season.

We will start at Sunset Grill in Allston with many stops along the way as we wind our way down Comm Ave to Kenmore Square. Here is the full list.

1:30 -- Sunset Grill and Tap (we'll have solids with our beer here)
3:00 -- Common Ground
4:00 -- White Horse Tavern
5:00 -- 973 Commonwealth Ave (formerly T's Pub, less creatively named)
6:00 -- The Dugout
7:00 -- Boston Beer Works (round two of solids?)
8:00 -- Game On (the other option for round two of solids)
9:00 -- Cask'N Flagon (There's a DJ here so we can shake it!)

There is no cost to join the pub crawl but we will have long sleeve T-shirts for sale.

check out last years Pub Crawl
item.how_to_find_us: We will have (and sell) pub crawl Tshirt
item.name: Pub Crawl
